ygData.subject: Re: The Whole Firearm Thing
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think the shield is weakening power, just the power supply of the base is getting low. But I m not sure.

the base is getting low. But I'm not sure.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Might Menasor be able to grab him with minimal damages, due to 
> the shield's weakening power?
